name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Yellow Avenger
description:
The Super Villain Twenty Year Reunion is coming to Bikini Bottom and the
evil Dirty Bubble has kidnapped Mermaidman and Barnacleboy for the
festivities. It's up to Mermaidman's #1 fan, SpongeBob, to save the day.
Help SpongeBob use his new super powers to fight the Dirty Bubble and
his legions of evildoers.
